name: Commute for a better World
description:
Drive to your work at a charity organization and overcome angry protestors and lobbyists while also cleaning up your environment.

The game supports keyboard or gamepad controls.

WASD / Right Stick: Move Curser
AD + Space / Left Stick: Move Character
J / Right Trigger: Range Punch

NOTE: the web version is quite sensitive, so the downloaded windows version provides a better experience.
